effects.1: Decay consumed you, leaving only a withered and lifeless husk.
effects.2: Flesh, fat, and muscle have rotted away, revealing tainted and brittle bone.
effects.3: Your flesh is too putrid for even vultures to feast upon.
effects.4: The stench of your decaying form is so unbearable that your friends are tempted to burn it.
effects.5: The rotting, corrupted tissue of your corpse speaks of your necrotic doom.
effects.6: Darkened, decaying flesh marks your unnerving end.

effects.1: Flesh, fat, and muscle have rotted away, revealing tainted and brittle bone.
effects.2: Your flesh is too putrid for even vultures to feast upon.
effects.3: Your friends might find the smell of your cooked body pleasant if they weren’t your friends.
effects.4: The rotting, corrupted tissue of your corpse speaks of your necrotic doom.
effects.5: Darkened, decaying flesh marks your unnerving end.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely intact and ready for a noble funeral.

condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: All your limbs haver rotted, your lungs are diseased, and your face hideously scarred (as per both arms burned off both, both legs burned off, lungs blackened, gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Your eyes, ears, nose, and lips sloughed off under the corrupting darkness (as per both eyes lost, both ears lost, lips and tongue lost, and gruesome scarring)
effects.3: Both legs have rotted and must be amputated (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both arms have rotted and must be amputated (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions).
effects.5: Both your eyes were consumed by corrupting darkness (blinded, -4 attack throws, no LOS, movement reduced to ¼ normal, -2 to surprise rolls)
effects.6: Your screams of despair ended when necrosis claimed your lips and tongue (mute, cannot speak, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, and -4 to reaction rolls).

condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: One leg and one arm have rotted; the other half was merely scarred with necrosis (as per one leg lost, one arm lost, notable scarring)
effects.2: Both of your ears and most of your facial sloughed off (-2 to Listening throws, -2 to surprise rolls, gruesome scarring)
effects.3: One leg has rotted and must be amputated (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One arm has rotted and must be amputated (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon).
effects.5: One of your eyes melted in the heat (-2 to missile attack throws).
effects.6: Your lips and jaw were burned white (notable scarring)

condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your struggle to draw breath through diseased and ruined lungs (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilder-ness movement reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3)
effects.2: Your genitals have been reduced to rotten, pustulous ruin (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known).
effects.3: One foot has rotted and must be amputated (peg required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.4: One hand has rotted and must be amputated (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons).
effects.5: The flesh of one of your cheeks is pink and lump with a large burn scar (notable scarring).
effects.6: Your fingers are scarred where the flesh sloughed off (minor scarring).

condition_recovery: You are shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of rest.

effects.1: The skin on your face sloughs off leaving your face a hideous mask of necrotic tissue (gruesome scarring).
effects.2: Where once you had an ear, now you have a blackened mass of necrotic tissue (-1 to Listening throws and -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.3: 1d3 toes on one foot have rotted and must be amputated (3 lost toes on one foot makes foot useless).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers on one hand have rotted and must be amputated (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: The smallest finger on one hand is burned off (3 lost fingers on a hand makes it useless).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: The suffering that your body experienced lingers eternally (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: Your hair fell out in clumps, and half your torso and one arm are scarred by flesh-eating necrosis (two notable scarrings).
effects.3: Your hair fell out in clumps, leaving bald patches amidst a rotting scalp (notable scarring).
effects.4: Your hand is scarred where the flesh sloughed off (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: Your necrosis-marred body aches in bad weather  (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: Half your torso and one arm are scarred by flesh-eating necrosis (notable scarring).
effects.3: Your shoulder has an oozing necrotic scar where decay took hold (minor scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.
